title: Looking for Beckley or J Collins with a Polar Bear back SGC 3-4 preferred
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: Looking for Beckley or J Collins with a Polar Bear back SGC 3-4 preferred
posts.post_content:
Hey all,
Trying to line things up in the HOF backs line. I’m trying to fill the Polar Bear spot with one of the 350 only HOFers. Struggling to get all the 150/350 and 350 only guys in spots without to much duplication of backs. I’ve already checked these guys with P350 backs, but looking to use one of the HOFers in the Polar Bear spot.

Let me know if anyone would be looking to move either of these guys. I could buy or might have some trade you need.

Thanks,
Bob
PM me if you can help.
